tasks.label: Build Server
tasks.command: file=$(cargo build --package=wgsl_analyzer --message-format=json | jq '. | select(.reason == "compiler-artifact") | select(.target.kind == ["bin"]) | .executable' -r); mkdir -p ./editors/code/out; rm -f ./editors/code/out/wgsl_analyzer; cp "$file" ./editors/code/out/

windows.command: cargo build --package=wgsl_analyzer ; mkdir -p ./editors/code/out; rm ./editors/code/out/wgsl_analyzer; cp target/debug/wgsl_analyzer.exe ./editors/code/out/

tasks.label: Build Server (Release)
tasks.command: file=$(cargo build --package=wgsl_analyzer --message-format=json --release | jq '. | select(.reason == "compiler-artifact") | select(.target.kind == ["bin"]) | .executable' -r); mkdir -p ./editors/code/out; rm -f ./editors/code/out/wgsl_analyzer; cp "$file" ./editors/code/out/

windows.command: cargo build --package=wgsl_analyzer --release ; mkdir -p ./editors/code/out; rm ./editors/code/out/wgsl_analyzer; cp target/release/wgsl_analyzer.exe ./editors/code/out/
